channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging vegetation and unstable wall, 14th June
item.description:
Vegetation along the boundary wall of 247 Southlands Road (known to be rented) is blocking the public pathway between Southlands Rd and Bickley Crescent. Compounding this are trees to the rear of the same garden causing the brick boundary wall to lean towards the pathway. This wall can be moved by hand and is unstable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed car with missing plate dumped on public road 14Jun25, 14th June
item.description:
This car has been dumped on Wrottesley Road; untaxed since 1st May. Not moved in weeks. You can see it has no reg plate on the front and is accumulating parking tickets. For what itâ€™s worth - I have seen someone parking this on Wrottesley Road in May and he is the same man who has dumped the Mazda Sport reg plate RO09 OOC (which has flat tires, never moves) which is also reported.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wrottesley Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
